Complose a message

{% raw %}

create_html_message[source]

create_html_message(from_address, to_addresses, subject, html, text=None, image_path=Path('/Users/eandreas/projects/dev/secretsanta'))

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Add an attachment to a message

{% raw %}

add_attachmet[source]

add_attachmet(msg, path)

Add an attachment with location path to the cunnet message msg.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Send a message using SMTP and TLS

{% raw %}

send_smtp_email[source]

send_smtp_email(server, tls_port, user, pw, msg)

Send the message msg using the specified server and port - login using user and pw.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}
